title: Mindfulness Meditation-Integrated Emergency Simulation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Utilizes smartphone-based learning materials, combining on-site practical training with theoretical sessions.

learning_goals: Reduce learners' anxiety levels by 20% during emergency simulation training
Achieve a 15% or greater improvement in scores on the Teamwork Evaluation Assessment Scale (TEAS)
Obtain a score reduction of 10 or more points on the NASA-TLX cognitive workload scale
Enhance MAAS (Mindful Attention Awareness Scale) scores by 25% after a 4-week mindfulness meditation training program

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
